member.name: T:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw
member.summary: The CoolDraw class will handle a wide variety of GDI+/Painting and Drawing operations, including various image, text, cropping and gradient manipulation drawing and rendering in the various DotCool controls. In addition to function as a toolkit for various drawing and rendering operations, the class will contain many calculation, informational and utility type of functions that relate to graphics, texts and images of the DotCool controls.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawShape(Tiferix.Global.CoolShape,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Single,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color})
member.summary: Draws the appropriate shape according to the type of shape and border specified in the function's parameters. In addition to drawing the shape, the shape can be filled in with a solid color specified in the FillColor parameter of the function.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawRectangle(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a rectangle shape graphic with the border (and optionally fill color) specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawSquare(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color})
member.summary: Draws a square shape graphic with the border (and optionally fill color) specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawEllipse(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws an ellipse shape graphic with the border (and optionally fill color) specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawCircle(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color})
member.summary: Draws a circle shape graphic with the border (and optionally fill color) specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawPolyShape(Tiferix.Global.CoolShape,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color})
member.summary: Draws a specific polygon-shaped graphic with the border (and optionally fill color) specified in the function's parameters. The type of polygon shape graphic that is drawn depends on the shape specified in the polyShape parameter of the function.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawRoundedRectangle(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Single,System.Single,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a rounded rectangle shape graphic with the border and corner radius (and optionally fill color) specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawRoundedSquare(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Single,System.Single,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color})
member.summary: Draws a rounded square shape graphic with the border and corner radius (and optionally fill color) specified in the function's parameter.
Draws the appropriate gradient filled shape according to the type of shape, gradient and border specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawGradientRectangle(DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradientType,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a gradient filled rectangle shape graphic with the border and gradient specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawGradientSquare(DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradientType,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a gradient filled square shape graphic with the border and gradient specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawGradientEllipse(DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradientType,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws a gradient filled ellipse shape graphic with the border and gradient specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawGradientCircle(DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradientType,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a gradient filled circle shape graphic with the border and gradient specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawGradientPolyShape(Tiferix.Global.CoolShape,DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradientType,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a gradient filled polygon shape graphic with the border and gradient specified in the function's parameters. The type of polygon shape graphic that is drawn depends on the shape specified in the polyShape parameter of the function.
Draws a gradient filled rounded rectangle shape graphic with the border, corner radius and gradient specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawGradientRoundedSquare(DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradientType,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Single,System.Single,System.Drawing.Color,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a gradient filled rounded square shape graphic with the border, corner radius and gradient specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.CropEllipse(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Crops the bitmap passed to the image into an ellipse shape that will fit within the bounds specified in the function's parameter. The cropped image will be returned as a new bitmap image.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.CropCircle(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Crops the bitmap passed to the image into a circle shape that will fit within the bounds specified in the function's parameter. The cropped image will be returned as a new bitmap image.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.CropPolyShape(Tiferix.Global.CoolShape,System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Crops the bitmap passed to the image into a polygon shape based that will fit within the bounds specified in the function's parameter. Which polygon shape will be cropped will be determined by the shape passed to the polyShape parameter of the function. The cropped image will be returned as a new bitmap image.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.CropRoundedRect(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Single,System.Single,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Crops the bitmap passed to the image into a rounded rectangle shape that will fit within the bounds specified in the function's parameter. The cropped image will be returned as a new bitmap image.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.CropRoundedSquare(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Crops the bitmap passed to the image into a rounded square shape that will fit within the bounds specified in the function's parameter. The cropped image will be returned as a new bitmap image.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawText(System.String,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Point,System.Drawing.Size,System.Drawing.Font,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.ContentAlignment,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws the text specified in the function's Text parameter using the various text-related settings passed to the parameters of the function. The text will be drawn and rendered onto the graphics object passed to the function. Optionally, the text can be drawn with a focus rectangle around it if the DrawFocusRect parameter is set to true.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.GetTextFormatFlagAlign(System.Drawing.ContentAlignment)
member.summary: Gets the TextFormatFlags that can be used for rendering text using GDI operations based on the ContentAlignment enumeration value passed to the function.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.GetTextRectangle(System.String,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Font,System.Drawing.ContentAlignment)
member.summary: Calculates and returns a rectangle that surrounds the entire region of the displayed text with all formatting settings specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.ContentAlignment,System.Drawing.Point,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color},System.Boolean,Tiferix.Global.CoolImageSizeMode)
member.summary: Draws the image onto the graphics object specified in the function's parameter using the various image related settings passed into the function's parameters. If the image is set to Normal size mode, then the various alignment and offset positions can be used to position the image around the control. With other size modes, many of the additional imaging positioning parameters are not used and the image will be sized according to the size of the control and image. Optionally, a focus rectangle can be drawn around the image if the DrawFocusRect parameter is set to true.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.DrawImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Rectangle,Tiferix.Global.CoolImageSizeMode,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Drawing.Color},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws the image onto the graphics object specified in the function's parameter using the various image related settings passed into the function's parameters. If the image is set to Normal size mode, then the various alignment and offset positions can be used to position the image around the control. With other size modes, many of the additional imaging positioning parameters are not used and the image will be sized according to the size of the control and image. Optionally, a focus rectangle can be drawn around the image if the DrawFocusRect parameter is set to true.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.GetImageRectangle(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.ContentAlignment,System.Drawing.Point)
member.summary: Calculates and returns a rectangle that surrounds the entire region of the image with all positioning settings specified in the function's parameters. In the case, the image is sized to fit across the control, such as being stretched or sized to fit, then the image rectangle will be calculated to the size of where the image will be displayed based on the size of the control and image.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.GetImageRectangle(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle,Tiferix.Global.CoolImageSizeMode)
member.summary: Calculates and returns a rectangle that surrounds the entire region of the image with all positioning settings specified in the function's parameters. In the case, the image is sized to fit across the control, such as being stretched or sized to fit, then the image rectangle will be calculated to the size of where the image will be displayed based on the size of the control and image.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.SizeToFitImage(System.Drawing.Image,System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Proportionally resizes the image to fit within the bounds specified in the function.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.CalculateSquareRect(System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Calculates and returns a square rectangle based on the dimensions of the rectangle passed to the function. The square rectangle will be calculated based on the smaller of the two dimensions of the rectangle passed to the function. The smaller dimension will be set for both sides of the square rectangle, which will then be returned by the function.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.GetRoundedRectPath(System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Single,System.Single,System.Int32)
member.summary: Calculates and generates a gradient path that is used to draw a rounded rectangle based on the parameters that are passed to the function. The gradient path containing all the points quired to draw the rounded rectangle will be returned by the function after the path is constructed.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolDraw.ContainsPoint(System.Drawing.PointF[],System.Drawing.PointF)
member.summary: The function checks to see if the point passed in the point parameter is contained within the array of points specified in the aryPolygon parameter. If the array of points contained the specified point specified, then the function will return true, else it returns false. NOTE: The current implementation of this function performs a loop on the array which delays the appropriate mouse effects of the DotCoolControls from being displayed when the mouse interacts with the control. In future versions a hash table will be generated with the array points of the control for quicker checks of the region boundaries of the control.

member.name: T:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradientType
member.summary: Style/Pattern of gradient to use in the various set of DotCool controls.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradient.DrawGradient(DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradientType,System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws the appropriate style of gradient based on gradient type flag specified in the function parameter.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradient.DrawLinearGradient(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Drawing.Drawing2D.LinearGradientMode,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a linear style of gradient in the specified region passed to the function. The linear gradient will be drawn using the starting and ending colors and linear gradient style specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradient.DrawEllipsisGradient(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draws an elliptical style of gradient in the specified region passed to the function. The ellipitical gradient will be drawn using the starting and ending colors specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradient.DrawCircleGradient(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a symmetrical circle style of gradient in the specified region passed to the function. The circular gradient will be drawn using the starting and ending colors specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradient.DrawPolyGradient(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Int32,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a polygon gradient that uses an array of points in the specified region passed to the function. The number of points used to draw the polygon gradient will be determined by the Points parameter. A distribution of colors will be calculated based on the number of points and the starting and ending colors specified in the function's parameters to produce the appropriate gradient effect. NOTE: As of now, only 4 and 10 point polygon gradients are supported.
member.param: Indicates how many points will be used for drawing the polygon gradient. The following values are allowed: 4 and 10.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradient.DrawTriangleGradient(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Rectangle,System.Single,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draws a triangular style of gradient in the specified region passed to the function. The triangular gradient will be drawn using the starting and ending colors specified in the function's parameters.

member.name: M:DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradient.GetDefaultGradientSpan(DotCoolControls.Tools.CoolGradientType)
member.summary: Retrieves the default gradient span setting for the gradient type specified in the function's parameter. Each various gradient type will have a default gradient span that will be considered the optimal size for displaying the specific type of gradient.
